bibl.title: The Chronology of the Reign of Ptolemy II Reconsidered: The Evidence of the nkb and nht Tax Receipts.
bibl.note: A reconsideration of the chronology of the first half of Ptolemy II's reign, as well as of the early Ptolemaic tax system.

bibl.title: The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman

bibl.seg: MUHS Brian, The Chronology of the Reign of Ptolemy II Reconsidered: The Evidence of the nkb and nht Tax Receipts.

A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT and S.P. VLEEMING (Edd.), The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXX (Leiden, 1998) pp. 71-85, tabl.
A reconsideration of the chronology of the first half of Ptolemy II's reign, as well as of the early Ptolemaic tax system.
